author: Ryan King
title: Over half of black Georgia voters confident casting ballots will be fair in 2022: Poll

sentence: Key Facts Jones, who left the Democratic Party after backing Trump in 2020, tweeted: "My priority is - and has been since Day One - is to do whatever it takes to defeat Brian Kemp."
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Vernon Jones Staying In Georgia Governor's RaceBut Trump Wants Him To Drop Out

sentence: Jones indicated last week he planned to stay in the race, saying: "My priority is - and has been since Day One - is to do whatever it takes to defeat Brian Kemp."
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Vernon Jones Dropping From Georgia Governor's Race After Reported Pressure From Trump

sentence: We can't control polls that will more than likely underestimate the power of Georgia's voters of color or the commentary from pundits who were wrong about Georgia in 2020 and 2021, but we can make sure Georgians learn about the record of our eventual opponent, whether it's Brian Kemp, David Perdue, or Kandiss Taylor,? said Seth Bringman, an Abrams campaign spokesman.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Republicans lead Abrams in Georgia: poll
